title: Clinical Practical Competency Enhancement: Engagement Analysis and Instructional Design in Digital Reading Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Classify learner engagement profiles (affective, behavioral, cognitive) into three types by analyzing large-scale assessment data
Explain the impact of engagement patterns in digital reading assessments on academic achievement
Participants can develop an engagement-based assessment design applicable to real educational settings as a project deliverable.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
